programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: An evil is unleashed in a small town when a logging company sets up shop in the neighbouring woods. Horror, starring Kevin Durand, Lukas Haas and Steve Agee.(n)

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: A detective is sent to Alaska to investigate a murder during a month when the sun does not set. Sleep deprivation starts to take its toll, and he accidentally shoots his partner dead. He tries to cover it up, but the criminal they were hunting has seen everything and blackmails the cop into helping him escape justice. Thriller directed by Christopher Nolan, starring Al Pacino, Robin Williams and Hilary Swank.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
programme.desc: Retired bank robber John Doherty escapes a gunman with the aid of a young car thief, and together they go in search of the loot from the former crook's last job. When they discover the stash is missing - and John's thuggish old partners are also looking for it - the pair decide to do a repeat robbery. Comedy drama, starring Clint Eastwood, Jeff Bridges, George Kennedy and Geoffrey Lewis.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: A war veteran criss-crosses America with his disabled brother in tow as he builds a new career as a renowned prizefighter. However, his ruthless determination to make it to the top drives him to betray the people closest to him. Drama, starring Kirk Douglas, Marilyn Maxwell, Arthur Kennedy, Paul Stewart and Ruth Roman.

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: The highly strung producer of a Washington news bureau falls for a handsome but arrogant and totally untalented new anchorman, but is unaware a humble reporter friend is deeply infatuated with her. Comedy, starring Holly Hunter, William Hurt and Albert Brooks. Featuring an uncredited cameo from Jack Nicholson.

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers
programme.desc: The stories of three of the men in the famous photograph of US servicemen raising their flag on the island of Iwo Jima. After returning home from the battlefield, the veterans grapple with an increasing sense of survivor guilt as they struggle to adjust to everyday life. Clint Eastwood's Second World War drama, starring Adam Beach, Ryan Phillippe, Jesse Bradford, Jamie Bell and Paul Walker.

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch.

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: An enigmatic gunslinger forms an uneasy alliance with a military veteran to track down a notorious outlaw - but tensions simmer as their very different motives for the hunt put them increasingly at odds. Sergio Leone's Western sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volonte, Josef Egger, Mara Krup and Klaus Kinski.

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone.

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp.

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: A woman disappears without trace on her fifth wedding anniversary. Her husband contacts the police, but struggles to cope as his marriage is scrutinised by the media. As his behaviour grows stranger and more evasive, he finds himself accused of her murder. David Fincher's crime thriller based on Gillian Flynn's novel, starring Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike and Neil Patrick Harris.

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: An Elvis-obsessed ex-con and his lover set off on a nightmarish journey across America pursued by a variety of bizarre and deadly characters. David Lynch's dark road movie, starring Nicolas Cage, Laura Dern, Diane Ladd, Willem Dafoe, Harry Dean Stanton and Isabella Rossellini.(n)

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: A factory worker suffering from chronic insomnia has not slept properly in more than a year. When his extreme fatigue results in a tragic accident, his colleagues turn on him and he sinks into a state of intense paranoia, becoming obsessed with a man nobody else believes exists. Psychological thriller, starring Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Michael Ironside.(n)

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: A hard-boiled cavalry scout with a feral dog as companion stumbles across a woman and her child stranded on their homestead deep inside hostile territory. Despite repeated attacks by the Apaches, they refuse to leave their home, leaving the scout with no choice but to stay and defend her. Western, starring John Wayne, Geraldine Page, Ward Bond and Michael Pate.(n)

programme.title: MASH
programme.desc: American battlefield surgeons embark on a campaign of drinking, womanising and practical jokes in an attempt to alleviate the horror of the Korean War. Satirical comedy drama directed by Robert Altman, which spawned a long-running TV series. Starring Donald Sutherland, Elliott Gould, Tom Skerritt, Sally Kellerman and Robert Duvall.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Boxer Rubin `Hurricane' Carter dreams of winning the middleweight world title, only to be wrongfully thrown into prison for the murders of three people in a bar. Nineteen years later, a teenager reads the fighter's autobiography and sets out on a campaign to free him. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, John Hannah, Deborah Kara Unger, Liev Schreiber and Dan Hedaya.(n)

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. As the mods gather in Brighton for a weekend that turns to violence, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Jill McBain arrives in a frontier town to meet her husband, only to find he has been murdered. A railway tycoon wants the land Jill and her husband own, and has hired a ruthless hitman to kill them. But an outlaw, who was falsely accused of the crime, and a mysterious, vengeful stranger decide to protect her. Sergio Leone's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Jason Robards, Claudia Cardinale and Charles Bronson.(n)

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: A lonely photo technician develops an increasing obsession with a seemingly perfect couple and their child, whose pictures he processes - but when he uncovers evidence of marital infidelity, he resolves to expose the truth, regardless of the cost. Psychological thriller, starring Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole and Dylan Smith.(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: A teenage girl finds herself pregnant after a one-night stand with her best friend. Deciding to give her baby up for adoption, she thinks she has found the perfect parents in a yuppie couple. However, over the next nine months she begins to experience doubts about her plans. Comedy, starring Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner and Jason Bateman.(n)

programme.title: Dope
programme.desc: A geeky teenager in an inner-city neighbourhood harbours dreams of going to Harvard. He and his friends think their social standing at school is set to improve when they get an invitation to an underground party, but the night leaves them mixed up in crime and drugs and forced to grow up fast. Crime comedy, starring Shameik Moore and Tony Revolori.(n)

programme.title: Training Day
programme.desc: A cop embarks on his first day in narcotics, partnering a seasoned officer whose willingness to flout the rules forces him to question everything he has learnt. As they resort to extreme measures to crack a case, the rookie is left battling his conscience in a dangerous situation. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn and Tom Berenger.(n)

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: Crew members of a cargo spacecraft answer a distress call from a derelict alien vessel. However, their mission of mercy has fatal repercussions when a deadly, seemingly indestructible monster gets on board their ship and starts killing them one by one. Ridley Scott's sci-fi horror, starring Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, Ian Holm and John Hurt.

programme.title: The Death and Life of Charlie St Cloud
programme.desc: A man who survived the car crash that killed his brother becomes consumed with guilt. Taking a job in a cemetery, he begins seeing visions of his dead sibling and spends every night in the graveyard with him. When an old friend returns, she hopes to persuade him to let go of the past. Drama, starring Zac Efron, Charlie Tahan and Amanda Crew.

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
programme.desc: Weedy youngster Greg finds his plans for a lazy school holiday ruined when his mother bans video games and his father organises a series of family activities. When he finds out a girl he likes is working at a country club, he tells his family he has a summer job there as an excuse to spend time with her - but struggles to keep up the deception. Family comedy sequel, starring Zachary Gordon and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Jess befriends a new girl at school, and the pair begin to create their own imaginary kingdom in a secret place in the woods to escape the difficulties of their real lives. Unfortunately, a tragedy threatens to bring their fantasy world to an end. Drama based on Katherine Paterson's novel, starring Josh Hutcherson, AnnaSophia Robb, Zooey Deschanel and Robert Patrick.

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: A father-of-two struggling to cope with the death of his wife is in need of a fresh start, so buys a house with a dilapidated zoo on the grounds. With the help of the keepers, he works to restore the attraction to its former glory, while also trying to reconnect with his troubled teenage son. Fact-based comedy drama, starring Matt Damon, Scarlett Johansson and Thomas Haden Church.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: A workaholic father tries to make up for his perpetual absence from home by promising to buy his son a hugely popular action figure for Christmas - little realising every other father in town has the same idea. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Jake Lloyd, Rita Wilson, Robert Conrad and Phil Hartman.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: An expert takes a contract from the CIA to test a maximum security prison by trying to break out of it , but he soon discovers he has been duped and that his captors intend him to stay inside forever. He hatches a plan to escape, but to succeed he will need the help of a long-term convict - who wants his own freedom in return for assistance. Thriller, with Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx.

programme.title: Family Business
programme.desc: Reformed crook Vito has turned away from a life of crime - much to the dismay of his criminal father, Jessie. However, when his son Adam comes up with a supposedly foolproof plan for a robbery, Jessie is quick to get involved - forcing Vito to grudgingly abandon the straight and narrow to keep an eye on his family. Crime comedy, with Sean Connery, Dustin Hoffman, Matthew Broderick and Rosana DeSoto.(n)

programme.title: Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Soldiers escaping the American Civil War take flight in a giant observation balloon and land far away on a strange uncharted island, where they encounter giant creatures, cut-throat pirates, two shipwrecked Englishwomen - and the mysterious Captain Nemo. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Michael Craig, Herbert Lom, Joan Greenwood and Michael Callan, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: A survivor of a near-extinct race is given a dangerous quest as his world approaches an astronomical event that will decide its future. He must find a way to restore a broken piece to a magical crystal, which has become a source of dark power for the cruel creatures who wiped out his people. Jim Henson's puppet fantasy, with the voices of Stephen Garlick and Billie Whitelaw.(n)

programme.title: Judy Moody and the Not Bummer Summer
programme.desc: A girl looking forward to the summer holidays is faced with a boring break when she realises her friends are going away. However, the future brightens up when she goes to stay with her eccentric aunt and embarks on a series of manic adventures. Comedy based on Megan McDonald's series of children's books, starring Jordana Beatty and Heather Graham.(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan.(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock 'n' roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker.(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The daughter of retired special forces officer John Matrix is kidnapped by an old comrade-in-arms, now in league with a deposed former dictator. The tyrant plans to use the girl to force Matrix into assassinating the head of the country he once ruled, but is unprepared for the lengths to which the veteran soldier will go to rescue his child. Action adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rae Dawn Chong.(n)

programme.title: Aliens: Special Edition
programme.desc: Lone survivor Ripley is rescued in deep space decades after an alien creature wiped out her ship's entire crew. She is recruited to accompany a military expedition to a colony on the planet where she first encountered the monster, only to find the aliens have been reproducing and there are now hordes of them. Extended cut of James Cameron's sci-fi thriller sequel, with Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn and Lance Henriksen.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob offers to teach Elizabeth to drive, but she has little talent for it. Corabeth's secret drinking is getting out of hand, and threatens her career.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Verdie's daughter returns home after graduating from college, and is angry to find that racial prejudice stands in the way of her getting a job.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The locals celebrate the founding of Walnut Grove, but the contests held to mark the occasion bring out a competitive streak in the Ingalls and Oleson families.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Richest Man In Walnut Grove.
programme.desc: Charles loses his job at the lumber mill, so the family must all pull together to make ends meet.

programme.title: The Cry
programme.desc: Part one of two. Psychological thriller about a bereaved mother who becomes obsessed with another woman's baby. Still grieving over her own loss, child protection officer Meg Bartlet befriends new mother Christine Rearden, but the relationship turns sour when Meg sets out to prove baby Eleanor's breathing problems are the result of abuse. Starring Sarah Lancashire, Emma Cunniffe, Anthony Calf, James Laurenson and Joe Duttine.

programme.title: A Holiday to Remember
programme.desc: A single mum returns to her childhood home where she intends to escape from the pressures of life in Los Angeles - until an old boyfriend persuades her to rekindle the flames of their passion. Romantic drama, with Connie Sellecca, Randy Travis, Asia Vieria and Rue McClanahan.

programme.title: Homeless to Harvard: The Liz Murray Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the tale of a neglected child who overcame her poverty-stricken and traumatic beginnings to achieve her dream of academic success at the prestigious American university. Starring Thora Birch, Michael Riley, Robert Bockstael and Makyla Smith.

programme.title: The Murder of Mary Phagan
programme.desc: Part two of two. A Jewish factory owner in 1930s Georgia is unjustly accused of murder. Despite all the evidence pointing in another direction, an ambitious prosecutor and an unscrupulous journalist whip up a frenzy of anti-semitism against the suspect. However, the state governor sees through the bigotry and does everything in his power to see justice is done. Fact-based drama, starring Jack Lemmon, Peter Gallagher, Kevin Spacey and Richard Jordan.

programme.title: I Heard the Owl Call My Name
programme.desc: A terminally ill priest is sent by his bishop to be minister to a Native Canadian coastal village. He becomes accepted into their community, and as he witnesses its gradual destruction, gains the strength to face his own fate without fear. Drama based on Margaret Craven's novel, starring Tom Courtenay and Dean Jagger.

programme.title: Calendar Girl Murders
programme.desc: A detective is sent to investigate when the stars of a new raunchy calendar are murdered one at a time. He faces a race against time to find the killer before more blood is shed. Thriller, starring Tom Skerritt and Sharon Stone.

programme.title: Runaway Father
programme.desc: A woman who has been living in poverty for 20 years following her husband's death learns that he is still alive, having faked his demise so he could abandon his family. She resolves to track him down and force him to accept his responsibilities. Fact-based drama, starring Donna Mills and Jack Scalia.

programme.title: Angel in the Family
programme.desc: A widower reaches out to his estranged daughters after suffering a stroke and asks them to spend Christmas with him. Despite their misgivings, the warring sisters return home to be with him and experience a miracle when their late mother returns to life. Fantasy, starring Meredith Baxter, Tracey Needham, Natasha Gregson Wagner and Ronny Cox.

programme.title: Murder in a College Town
programme.desc: Mother-of-two Rose Earl proudly sends her eldest son off to college, only for him to be led into a life of crime by his dastardly roommate. When he subsequently disappears without trace, Rose embarks on a desperate search to discover what has become of him. Drama, starring Kate Jackson, Drew Ebersole and Matthew Settle.

programme.title: Jonathan Stone: Threat of Innocence
programme.desc: An ex-cop recovering from the death of his wife is accused of a murder he did not commit. He tries to prove his innocence by tracking down the real killer, enlisting the aid of a wealthy socialite. Crime drama, starring Richard Crenna and Beverly D'Angelo.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth is not happy when Grandma is visited by an old flame, while Jim-Bob persuades Yancy to use his talents to make fuel instead of moonshine.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The townsfolk is stunned by news of the attack on Pearl Harbor. Mary Ellen receives word that her husband is assumed to have been killed.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A decline in Mary's school performance is explained when Charles discovers that she needs glasses. However, she loses her confidence when her classmates begin to tease her.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura unwittingly befriends Walnut Grove's new banker while out fishing, and is stunned when he suggests she is only being kind to him so he will give her father a loan.(n)

programme.title: The Cry
programme.desc: Part two of two. Meg's abduction of Eleanor hits the headlines, forcing her to go on the run under an assumed name. She breaks into Christine's family home and poses as a journalist in the hope of uncovering evidence of child abuse. Psychological thriller, starring Sarah Lancashire, Emma Cunniffe and Anthony Calf.(n)

programme.title: Secret Santa
programme.desc: A 10-year-old orphan is sent to live with his aunt after the deaths of his parents, and befriends an old man. He starts to believe his new friend is really Santa Claus, but his new guardian worries that the seemingly kindly stranger is a conman taking advantage of the youngster's faith. Family drama, starring Sherilyn Fenn, Hume Cronyn and Rory Culkin.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Changes
programme.desc: Two single parents, a successful journalist and a wealthy, widowed heart surgeon, fall in love and rush headlong into marriage. However, the move proves to have far-reaching consequences for them and their children. Romantic drama, starring Cheryl Ladd, Michael Nouri and Christopher Gartin.(n)

programme.title: The Disappearing Act
programme.desc: A distraught mother turns detective to find out the truth behind her son's disappearance, concerned he may have met with foul play at the hands of his beautiful but volatile girlfriend. Fact-based drama, starring Patty Duke, Kelly Rowan and Robert Floyd.(n)

programme.title: On the Second Day of Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her niece are caught stealing just before Christmas, and face the prospect of spending the festive season in the care of social services - until a kindly shop worker volunteers to put them up. Romantic drama, starring Mary Stuart Masterson and Mark Ruffalo.(n)

programme.title: A Dream for Christmas
programme.desc: An Arkansas minister moves his family across America when he is placed in charge of a Los Angeles church, only to find the congregation is small and the building threatened with demolition. The clergyman is determined to make a success of his new posting, and as Christmas approaches, something miraculous occurs. Drama, starring Hari Rhodes and Beah Richards.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara.(n)

programme.title: Charles: A Man Alone
programme.desc: Documentary profile of the Prince of Wales, pondering what the future holds for the heir to the British throne.(n)

programme.title: Princess Diana: The Uncrowned Queen
programme.desc: Documentary presenting an account of the princess's life.(n)

programme.title: William and Kate: Into the Future
programme.desc: Documentary about the royal couple's relationship, that examines what the future may hold.(n)

programme.title: Queen Elizabeth II: 60 Years On
programme.desc: A look back at the historical events of the queen's reign.(n)

programme.title: Friendly Fire
programme.desc: A distraught woman struggles to overcome a wall of silence to find out the truth about her soldier son's death during the Vietnam War. As revelations about his accidental shooting emerge, the mourning mother launches a crusade against America's involvement in the conflict. Drama based on a true story, starring Carol Burnett, Ned Beatty, Sam Waterson and Dennis Erdman.(n)

programme.title: Sharing the Secret
programme.desc: A teenager struggles with bulimia, while her psychologist mother deals with her guilt at not recognising the signs of an eating disorder. Drama, starring Alison Lohman, Mare Winningham and Roxana Brusso.

programme.title: God Bless the Child
programme.desc: Poverty and hardship force a single mother and her seven-year-old daughter to move into a shelter for the homeless. Drama, starring Mare Winningham, Grace Johnston and Dorian Harewood.

programme.title: Video Voyeur: The Susan Wilson Story
programme.desc: A woman is understandably horrified to discover her apparently kind-hearted neighbour has somehow managed to install state-of-the-art surveillance equipment throughout her home, so he can spy on her and her family. Fact-based drama, starring Angie Harmon, Jamey Sheridan and Dale Midkiff.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. John-Boy is rushed into hospital to have a blood clot removed from his brain.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The children are unhappy when Miss Hunter needs to take leave because of a family emergency and a substitute teacher is sent to take over her job.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Palomino
programme.desc: A photographer, struggling to overcome the break-up of her marriage by going to live on a friend's California ranch, where her riding skills impress the ranch hands - one of whom she embarks on a passionate affair with. However, her life takes a turn for the worse when her new lover is unable to cope with the class difference between them and an accident leaves her paralysed. Drama, starring Lee Horsley, Lindsay Frost, Eva Marie Saint and Rod Taylor.

programme.title: Prophet of Evil: The Ervil LeBaron Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, about religious fanatic Ervil LeBaron, who believed he had God's permission to kill anyone standing in the way of his drive for wealth and power. Starring Brian Dennehy, Tracy Needham and William Devane.

programme.title: An Element of Truth
programme.desc: A scheming woman working for a private investment company uses the knowledge gained from her job to plot a seemingly foolproof robbery. Thriller, with Donna Mills and Peter Reigert.

programme.title: No One Could Protect Her
programme.desc: A woman is raped in her own home, but the police seem powerless to apprehend the attacker. As reports of further sexual assaults in her neighbourhood mount up, all seemingly the work of the same man, she resolves to turn detective and bring him to justice herself. Thriller based on a true story, starring Joanna Kerns, Anthony John Denison and Peter MacNeill.

programme.title: Video Voyeur: The Susan Wilson Story
programme.desc: A woman is understandably horrified to discover her apparently kind-hearted neighbour has somehow managed to install state-of-the-art surveillance equipment throughout her home, so he can spy on her and her family. Fact-based drama, starring Angie Harmon, Jamey Sheridan and Dale Midkiff.

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part drama. Shannen Doherty and Kevin Dillon star as parents searching for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, with Edward Asner, Dixie Carter and Michael Brandon.

programme.title: Guilty Hearts
programme.desc: Conclusion. Fact-based crime drama about a manipulative Illinois doctor who murders his wife in order to be with his mistress. Treat Williams, Marcia Gay Harden and Gary Basaraba star.

programme.title: Jonathan Stone: Threat of Innocence
programme.desc: An ex-cop recovering from the death of his wife is accused of a murder he did not commit. He tries to prove his innocence by tracking down the real killer, enlisting the aid of a wealthy socialite. Crime drama, starring Richard Crenna and Beverly D'Angelo.

programme.title: Family Rescue
programme.desc: A teenager is raped and becomes pregnant by her mother's boyfriend - but to her horror, the court grants him custody of the child. Drama, starring George C Scott, Rachael Leigh Cook, Dom Diamont and Ally Sheedy.(n)

programme.title: Untamed Love
programme.desc: A teacher who specialises in tutoring children with learning difficulties forms a close bond with a violent girl traumatised by years of physical and psychological abuse. Fact-based drama, starring Cathy Lee Crosby, Ashlee Lauren, John Getz and Richard Fancy.(n)

programme.title: Who Will Love My Children
programme.desc: A woman is diagnosed with terminal cancer shortly after the birth of her 10th child, and realising she has far too many children for her husband to look after on his own, decides to spend her remaining years finding suitable families to adopt them. Fact-based drama, starring Ann-Margret, Frederic Forrest, Cathryn Damon and Donald Moffat.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma inherits an old friend's legacy and promptly decides to share the proceeds between her grandchildren, but her well-meaning action has unforeseen consequences.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An airmail plane has engine trouble and the pilot has to take emergency measures by landing the craft in the Waltons' meadow.(n)

programme.title: Crown Heights
programme.desc: Two men living in a area surrounded by racial tension between the Jewish and Black communities try to bring their divided neighbourhood together through their passion for music in the aftermath of rioting. Fact-based drama, starring Howie Mandel, Mario Van Peebles and Jeremy Blackman.(n)

programme.title: Hostile Advances: The Kerry Ellison Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman who is forced to take on the entire justice system to rid herself of an unbalanced workmate's unwanted attentions - and finds she needs all her reserves of strength to see the case through. Starring Rena Sofer, Victor Garber, Maria Ricossa and Karen Allen.(n)

programme.title: The Babysitter's Seduction
programme.desc: When the wife of her wealthy employer is found dead, unsuspecting babysitter Michelle is drawn into a sinister plot and finds herself being accused of murder by a determined detective. Thriller, starring Keri Russell, Stephen Collins, Phylicia Rashad and Tobin Bell.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma finally returns home after her stroke, but everyone is so protective of her that she no longer feels she is needed or has a place in the family.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A handsome minister comes to Walnut Grove and causes a stir when he begins secret meeting with the town's women secretly - especially as Almanzo and John are away on business.(n)

programme.title: Death in the Shadows
programme.desc: A man becomes convinced that his father is innocent of murdering his mother - despite his conviction in a court of law. Determined to get to the truth, he begins his own investigation, but faces an arduous struggle to ensure the real killer is finally brought to justice. Fact-based thriller, starring Peter Strauss, Henry Czerny and Lindsay Frost.(n)

programme.title: The Forget-Me-Not Murders
programme.desc: A policeman races against time to find a serial killer who leaves dried flowers next to each of his victims, and the chase becomes even more desperate when he learns that his goddaughter could be next on the murderer's list. Detective thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Tyne Daly, Cliff Gorman and Neve Campbell.(n)

programme.title: Shaka Zulu
programme.desc: Biopic of the African leader, following his rise to power in the 19th century as he united several tribes into a single state. Starring Henry Cele.(n)

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross
programme.desc: Four salesmen in a Chicago real estate office are issued with a warning that two of them will be fired. They resort to desperate and dishonest tactics to ensure they outperform their colleagues, but the eldest of the group fears his waning skills are not up to the task. Drama based on David Mamet's stage play, starring Jack Lemmon, Al Pacino, Kevin Spacey and Alec Baldwin.(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Get Even Before Leavin'. With the Russian mob threatening his family, Ray goes on a road trip with Mickey to Primm in hopes of recovering money stolen from a local casino owner. Meanwhile, Terry gains confidence as a trainer and gets renewed interest in the gym; and Bunchy and Bridget take turns looking after baby Maria when Teresa withdraws to her family's house to seek refuge from the pressures of being a new mom

programme.title: The Circus: Inside The Greatest Political Show on Earth
programme.desc: Trump Show. The political circus goes into overdrive as Donald Trump is crowned the Republican nominee, and his wife, Melania, delivers a controversial speech. Also: Trump's children try to humanize their dad; and Vice Presidential nominee Mike Pence strives for party unity

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as troubled boxer Billy Hope in this high-stakes drama from director Antoine Fuqua and Sons of Anarachy creator Kurt Sutter. At the height of his fame and success, Hope is convinced by his loving wife Maureen (Rachel McAdams) to retire from the sport in order to spend more time with the couple's daughter Leila (Oona Laurence). On the night of his retirement announcement, a rival boxer calls out Hope and an altercation breaks out, killing Maureen. Hope's self-destructive behavior worsens, and Leila is taken away by child services. In order to redeem his life and get his daughter back, Hope must return to boxing under the tutelage of hardened trainer Titus "Tick" Willis (Forest Whitaker)

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: A radio DJ stationed in a US base in Vietnam infuriates the brass with his own anarchic brand of humour

programme.title: Punch-Drunk Love
programme.desc: A shy sad-sack with a great deal of repressed anger that occasionally bursts forth in sudden violent outrages falls in love with a co-worker of one of his seven sisters

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Segments include a look at the on-and-off track rivalry between Formula One teammates Lewis Hamilton and Nico Rosberg; a report on the ancient Irish game of hurling; and a visit with a fishing guide known as "Fly Girl."

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing
programme.desc: From 2014: Erislandy Lara vs. Ishe Smith in a light-middleweight bout in San Antonio

programme.title: The Circus: Inside The Greatest Political Show on Earth

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib performs a stand-up routine in which he social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: Five crooks. One job. Twenty dead. It's all the work of unseen crimelord Keyser Soze. .. but who is he? Devilishly clever thriller. Very strong language from the start. (1995)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A slick, trigger-happy detective flouts the law as he goes on the hunt for a rich murderer whose power and influence could get him off the hook. Crime thriller

programme.title: The Circus: Inside The Greatest Political Show on Earth
programme.desc: Trump Show. The political circus goes into overdrive as Donald Trump is crowned the Republican nominee, and his wife, Melania, delivers a controversial speech. Also: Trump's children try to humanize their dad; and Vice Presidential nominee Mike Pence strives for party unity

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Get Even Before Leavin'. With the Russian mob threatening his family, Ray goes on a road trip with Mickey to Primm in hopes of recovering money stolen from a local casino owner. Meanwhile, Terry gains confidence as a trainer and gets renewed interest in the gym; and Bunchy and Bridget take turns looking after baby Maria when Teresa withdraws to her family's house to seek refuge from the pressures of being a new mom

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: Friends and Family. Needy friends and family descend upon the crew when the band visits Denver, their hometown. Meanwhile, Christopher House's infamous ex-girlfriend, Janine, appears and must be kept away from him at all costs

programme.title: The Circus: Inside The Greatest Political Show on Earth
programme.desc: In the Arena. The Democrats make Hillary Clinton a historic nominee; Bernie Sanders diehards jeer and boo in Philadelphia. Also: a look at whether shattering the glass ceiling is enough for Clinton and Kaine to unite their party into a winning coalition

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Fish and Bird. Ray waits to see if Belikov will be released from prison and struggles with the prospect of putting a pimp back out on the street. Later, Art dealer Sonia Kovitsky invites Ray to a breast cancer benefit where he encounters some former clients and becomes more entrenched in her operation. Meanwhile, Teresa spirals into a postpartum depression; and Mickey tries to persuade the DA that he was the sole architect behind the Minassian massacre

programme.desc: Biopic of artist Margaret Keane, who lived in obscurity while her husband Walter shot to fame by claiming that he was responsible for her popular portraits of little children with saucer-like eyes(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A robotic dog goes in search of a family after the lab he belongs to is shut down(n)

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: A moody memory piece about five doomed teenage sisters in 1970s suburbia(n)

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: A British soldier who was held as a prisoner of war by the Japanese during World War II confronts the guard who tortured him in order to find closure to that painful chapter of his life(n)

programme.title: The DUFF
programme.desc: A teen is devastated to learn that her classmates consider her the "designated ugly fat friend." In response, she enlists a jock's help in regaining her confidence, and plots to dethrone the school's queen bee(n)

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Mesmerizing fact-based thriller about the search for the elusive mass murderer known as the Zodiac Killer, who terrorized the San Francisco Bay Area for a number of years in the 1970s. Jake Gyllenhaal plays newspaper political cartoonist Robert Graysmith, upon whose book the script is based. Mark Ruffalo plays Insp. Dave Toschi, who was the inspiration for the title characters in Steve McQueen's "Bullitt" and Clint Eastwood's "Dirty Harry." Robert Downey Jr. Directed by David Fincher(n)

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Mathematician Alan Turing attempts to crack the Enigma code during World War II(n)

programme.title: Exorcismus
programme.desc: When insular teenager Emily's behaviour turns bizarre and terrible things happen to those close to her, her parents turn to an exorcist

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: In this spooky and surreal chiller, an American movie producer (Anastasia Hille) searching for her birth parents inherits a house in Russia that holds dark and dangerous secrets from her past. Directed by Nacho Cerda

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: In a world devoid of all conflict, a teenager causes chaos after getting a glimpse of his community's troubled past

programme.title: Wet Foot/Dry Foot
programme.desc: Two Cuban refugees trying to pilot a homemade raft to the United States become stranded on a deserted island off of Florida. Francisco Gattorno, Jorge Luis Álvarez. Written and directed by Carlos V. Gutierrez

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: Three high-tech tribes engage in a deadly war for supremacy and survival on a distant planet

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: A banished warrior and a hermit wizard must team up to battle a powerful druid in an effort to save the Celt people in the dark ages of Britain

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Creatures of the night find new prey on the scariest night of the year in this horror story. It's Halloween night, and four friends -- Allison (Vanessa Horneff), Elliott (Wil Horneff), Trevor (Karl Jacob), and Brian (Sean Reid) -- are on a road trip en route to a friend's wedding when their car breaks down after running into something. Looking for help, the four happen upon the farmhouse of an elderly couple, Elvin (Richard Little) and May (Barbara Wilhide), which is located next to a huge barn. Elvin and May have already become lost in the darkness of the barn, and soon two of the lost travelers are suffering the same fate as they search for friendly strangers. However, while they can barely see a hand in front of their face, they discover they're not alone in the barn, which has become home to a huge swarm of bloodthirsty bats. The Roost is framed by an introduction and postscript from a television horror show host, played by Tom Noonan

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: An exploration of the decline of video-game giant Atari and its secret burial of unsold "E.T." game cartridges in a New Mexico landfill

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A high school student discovers he's a werewolf after his parents are savagely murdered. He later ends up in a remote mountain town, where he meets others of his kind and fights for the love of a beautiful woman

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: A supernatural being torments a family one year after the death of their daughter

programme.title: The Hybrid
programme.desc: Elite mercenaries battle both humans and aliens after they discover illegal scientific experiments

programme.title: The Roost

It's Halloween night, and four friends -- Allison (Vanessa Horneff), Elliott (Wil Horneff), Trevor (Karl Jacob), and Brian (Sean Reid) -- are on a road trip en route to a friend's wedding when their car breaks down after running into something. programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: A telekinetic coma patient torments a young nurse while he is subjected to cruel experiments

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: A young photographer with a huge, red heart-shaped birthmark on his face learns that reptilian monsters are posing as street gangs in London. Their leader offers to remove his facial disfigurement in return for performing some evil deeds

programme.title: Dark Hearts
programme.desc: A struggling urban artist finds himself on a treacherous road after meeting his muse at a mysterious underground club

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: An officer mulls sacrificing passengers on an overcrowded lifeboat in order to prevent the vessel from foundering(n)

programme.title: Reaper
programme.desc: A botched execution creates a monster who does battle with a town of criminals(n)

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: A grieving mother becomes possessed by an unknown dark force in this paranormal horror film. A year after the death of their child, Bethany (Sienna Guillory) and her husband are still reeling. After Bethany begins to act strange, and her behavior becomes increasingly more horrifying and dangerous, a priest (Eric Roberts) is called in to exprcise the demons that appear to be within her(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: In this riveting fantasy adventure, two siblings search for their missing parents after they learn they're descendants of a group of protectors who safeguard special objects, such as a fairy-tale mirror their parents were looking for when they vanished(n)

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Days
programme.desc: The members of a gentlemen's club in London challenge one of their number, the eccentric inventor Phileas Fogg, to navigate his way around the world by any means possible and return within 80 days. Fogg teams up with a Chinese thief and begins his odyssey under the watchful eye of a police inspector who believes he may have robbed a bank just prior to his departure(n)

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: A movie-theater cashier believes he's the son of God, and is accosted by a ghost who claims to dwell in limbo. This forces him to rethink his place in the universe, and soon he believes the ghost can help him understand his fate(n)

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: After discovering a top secret rocketpack, a stunt pilot makes a name for himself as a jet-powered superhero(n)

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: The Host and Mother director Bong Joon-ho makes his English-language debut with this dystopian sci-fi thriller set in the aftermath of a failed global-warming experiment that ushered in the dawn of a new Ice Age. As a perpetual-motion engine keeps a super-powered locomotive speeding around the planet, the impoverished lower classes occupy the rear cars while the privileged upper classes are pampered in the front. The fragile balance of power between the two begins to shift, however, when an enigmatic message sparks a revolt that cannot be quelled. Luke Evans, Song Kang-ho, Jamie Bell, John Hurt, Tilda Swinton, and Ed Harris star(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: The plans of five college friends headed for a fun-filled weekend get abruptly changed when they find a 7-year-old girl alone at an empty café and have no choice but to drive her home. Once there, the group's worst nightmares are realized(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Engineer Dev Patel reprograms a police droid so it can think and feel, but there are dangerous consequences. Sci-fi action with Hugh Jackman and Sigourney Weaver. (2015)(116 mins)(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: In this riveting fantasy adventure, two siblings search for their missing parents after they learn they're descendants of a group of protectors who safeguard special objects, such as a fairy-tale mirror their parents were looking for when they vanished(n)

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: Bigfoot stalks five friends during a camping trip in the East Texas wilderness

programme.title: The Thaw
programme.desc: As a recognized environmental attorney, dr. David Kruipen, discovers a prehistoric species in the inland ice, he takes a team of four ecology students on a research mission to a remote base in the Arctic. The group makes a discovery that goes beyond their wildest fantasies. An unknown and lethal parasite has been revived and is now searching for a new and warm-blooded host

programme.title: Common
programme.desc: A 17-year-old boy faces murder charges after a friend riding in his car stabs someone to death, due to a cop who uses the controversial joint-enterprise doctrine to try everyone possible for the crime

programme.title: Echoes of War
programme.desc: In this thrilling post-Civil War drama, a veteran returns home to his Texas countryside ranch. Attempting to rid himself of the horrors of war, he instead finds himself involved in a conflict with a neighboring rancher

programme.title: Leave the World Behind
programme.desc: Electronic-music group Swedish House Mafia embark on their final world tour

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: A hip-hop-loving teen strives to master the game of table tennis during a family vacation to Ocean City, Md., in 1985. Now, in a bid to win the heart of a pretty girl, he'll have to go paddle-to-paddle against a rich bully who's determined to paint him as a loser(r)

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: In this family film a young boy living in a small country town dreams of making it to the World Paper Plane Championships in Japan despite having no funds to get there and a disapproving father. Directed by Robert Connolly. Cast includes Sam Worthington and Ed Oxenbould(r)

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: The raucous history of the infamous spring break revelries in Daytona Beach, Fla., that began in the early 1960s is chronicled(r)

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya (?)
Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg stars in Antoine Fuqua's thriller as Bob Swagger, an ex-Special Ops sharpshooter. He's called out of retirement by Col Isaac Johnson to help foil an assassination attempt on the President, but ends up framed as the assassin. Injured and on the run, he can only rely on Sara Fenn, the girlfriend of his ex-partner, and FBI agent Nick Memphis, who's come across evidence of the conspiracy. The three have to evade Johnson and his cohorts in a race to prove their innocence in this intelligent action movie

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Dangerous convict Jack Conrad, awaiting execution for crimes he did not commit, is bought by a television producer and taken to a deserted island in the South Pacific. There he is offered the oportunity to escape Death Row by taking part in a number of fights to the death with other prisoners. Breckel, the corrupt producer, plans to broadcast the illegal tournament live over the internet, but there could be more to Jack than meets the eye

programme.title: NYC Underground
programme.desc: Rich Manhattan kids head to Brooklyn for a concert, and cross a group of thugs who send them fleeing into the subway system

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: A mechanic who moonlights as an underground race-car driver strives to take the top prize in America's most prominent street race in order to have his revenge against the ambitious ex-NASCAR champ who had him framed and sent to prison. Inspired by the popular video-game franchise of the same name, Need for Speed tells the story of garage owner Tobey Marshall (Aaron Paul). Desperate to keep his family-owned business afloat, Marshall forms an uncomfortable partnership with wealthy ex-NASCAR star Dino Brewster (Dominic Cooper). That partnership falls apart when a lucrative sale to car broker Julia Bonet (Imogen Poots) fails to pan out, and unscrupulous Brewster uses a tragic street-racing mishap to have the innocent Marshall incarcerated. Released from prison two years later, the vengeful Marshall plots to prove his mettle by winning the De Leon -- an illicit race showcasing the country's top underground talents. But getting to the De Leon will be no simple task, because not only has the ruthless Brewster put a bounty on Marshall's prized car, but the police are hot on his trail during the white-knuckle, coast-to-coast dash. Fortunately for Marshall, his loyal crew and Bonet are willing to help him get to the starting line in time for the big race. Scott "Kid Cudi" Mescudi, Ramon Rodriguez, and Michael Keaton co-star

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg stars in Antoine Fuqua's thriller as Bob Swagger, an ex-Special Ops sharpshooter. He's called out of retirement by Col Isaac Johnson to help foil an assassination attempt on the President, but ends up framed as the assassin. Injured and on the run, he can only rely on Sara Fenn, the girlfriend of his ex-partner, and FBI agent Nick Memphis, who's come across evidence of the conspiracy. The three have to evade Johnson and his cohorts in a race to prove their innocence in this intelligent action movie

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Robert Rodriguez teams with Frank Miller to direct this follow-up to "Sin City" that finds the character of Dwight getting wrapped up in the thralls of femme fatale Ava, and a mysterious gambler named Johnny on a mission to take down his sworn enemy in a high-stakes game of life and death(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate(n)

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: WWE superstar "Stone Cold" Steve Austin stars as a death row inmate who gets a rare second shot at life in director Scott Wiper's adrenaline-charged action thriller. Jack Conrad (Austin) is a dangerous convict currently awaiting execution in a corrupt Central American prison. "Purchased" by a wealthy television producer and transported to a deserted island, the formidable inmate is offered the opportunity to avoid capital punishment and win back his freedom by fighting to the death against nine other condemned criminals in an illegal game to be broadcast uncensored over the Internet. Rick Hoffman and Vinnie Jones co-star in a brutal battle royal of non-stop carnage(n)

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Richard Linklater's Boyhood is a coming-of-age drama that the director spent twelve years making. He cast a young boy, Ellar Coltrane, and shot the film a few days at a time for over a decade so that he could capture how his leading actor, and the rest of his cast, aged. The film's story simply follows a boy named Mason (Coltrane) as he progresses from age 6 to 18 and deals with the typical travails of childhood like his parents' divorce, bad stepparents, falling in love, finding his artistic voice, and fighting with his bratty older sister. Ethan Hawke and Patricia Arquette co-star as Mason's parents(n)

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: Disgraced record exec Mark Ruffalo attempts to kick-start the career of heartbroken songwriter Keira Knightley in this poignant musical comedy from the director of Once(n)

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: In this comedy, a middle-aged man juggles his problems with women, literature, and a career, while a younger man chases the artifact of his dreams. Pittsburgh college professor Grady Tripp (Michael Douglas) is currently single following his divorce from his third wife; after publishing an acclaimed first novel, Grady has been working on a follow-up, but he's been sidelined by a severe case of writer's block. Grady has more than his writing career to think about; his affair with one of the (married) chancellors at the University of Pittsburgh (Frances McDormand), has resulted in her pregnancy, while Hannah (Katie Holmes), a student boarding at Grady's house, has developed a crush on him. While Grady is obsessed with his book, one of his students (Tobey Maguire) has an obsession of his own: finding a jacket once owned by Marilyn Monroe. Based on the novel by Michael Chabon, The Wonder Boys also features Robert Downey Jr., Rip Torn, and Richard Thomas(n)

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: In this hysterical comedy, a man becomes obsessed with trying to convince the most-popular guy from his high school to attend their 20-year reunion(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Harrowing docudrama about a 1971 psychological experiment in which 24 male undergrads at Stanford were asked to role-play as guards and inmates in a mock prison setting(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A disillusioned drone pilot, who controls spy aircrafts hovering over the Middle East from a trailer in Las Vegas, begins to feel morally disconnected from his military orders(n)

programme.title: All Things Must Pass: The Rise and Fall of Tower Records
programme.desc: A retail powerhouse since 1960, Tower Records was the heart and soul of the music world until the company filed for bankruptcy in 2006. It is widely believed that the death knell of the once billion dollar behemoth is attributed to the meteoric rise of the internet but director Colin Hanks examines the other explosive factors responsible for the tragic demise of this iconic record store chain(n)

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: Disgraced record exec Mark Ruffalo attempts to kick-start the career of heartbroken songwriter Keira Knightley in this poignant musical comedy from the director of Once(n)

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: A young woman falls for her comatose brother's favorite musician in this delightful romance set among the indie-music set in Brooklyn(n)

programme.title: State Property 2
programme.desc: Hip-hop mogul Damon Dash wrote, directed, and stars in this hard-hitting examination of life in the criminal underground of a great city. Three different crime bosses are locked in a battle over the drug trade in Philadelphia. New York transplant Dame (Damon Dash) and his umbrella crew command a powerful network that controls the city's dope traffic, but he has two bitter rivals who both oversee competing gangs from behind bars -- Beans (Beanie Siegel), Philly-born leader of the once-dominant ABM Crime Syndicate, and Loco (Noreaga), a slick street hustler from Miami who has the bankroll to finance a powerful operation. As these three men and their underlings scramble for money and power, another player is quietly consolidating his forces and rising up against them. State Property 2: Philly Streets also features supporting performances from Mariah Carey, Ol' Dirty Bastard, Cam'ron, and a handful of other hip-hop and R&B stars(n)

programme.title: Good Luck Chuck
programme.desc: Rollicking sex comedy stars Dane Cook as a cursed dentist who becomes the object of every single woman's affections when they learn that each woman he sleeps with marries the very next man she dates. A delightful Jessica Alba costars as the girl of his dreams, whom he's afraid to bed because then she'll find true love with the next man in her life. Dan Fogler is a hoot as Cook's licentious plastic-surgeon buddy. Directed by Mark Helfrich. Ellia English, Sasha Pieterse, Lonny Ross

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief (John Travolta) gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live From Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Public Enemy perform at Metropolis Studios in London

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: When a hard-luck blue-collar worker and his two best friends are mistaken for Army Reservists by a tough-talking Army sergeant, the plane set to fly them to the front lines of Iraq mistakenly drops them in the middle of Mexico to disastrous results in a freewheeling military comedy starring Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall, and D.J. Qualls. Larry (the Cable Guy) has lost his job and his woman in the short span of 24 hours. Convinced that some suds and target shooting are just the right remedies for a broken, jobless heart, Larry sets out with his next-door neighbor Bill (Engvall) and their trigger-happy pal Everett (Qualls) in order to blast off some rounds and down some brews. Their relaxing weekend soon takes an unexpected turn, however, when hard-case Army sergeant Kilgrove (Keith David) mistakes the trio as slacking Army reservists and loads them in a plane bound for Fallujah. Subsequently air-dropped over Mexico due to pilot error, the clueless, wannabe war heroes become convinced that they're actually in the Middle East and set out to save a rural village from what they assume to be an insurgent uprising. Though the thankful locals champion the noble but dimwitted trio for their heroism, the celebration is short-lived as ruthless warlord Carlos Santana (Danny Trejo) pays a personal visit to the town with a plan to confront the fearless warriors who dared to challenge his iron-fist rule

programme.title: Sicko
programme.desc: Michael Moore diagnoses the state of the American healthcare system in this provocative documentary. Included: testimony from insurance executives and patients who were denied reimbursement; comparisons with health care in other countries

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: A modern-day marine biologist (Josh Hartnett) slips into a coma, taking him on an epic journey through time while exploring his undying love for a woman that spanned four centuries. As he fights for his life on a hospital bed, his journey through the First Anglo-Maratha War becomes interwoven through passion and love

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: In a world devoid of all conflict, a teenager causes chaos after getting a glimpse of his community's troubled past

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Matt Damon plays Tom Ripley, a sociopathic murderer in the making sent to Italy to bring back Dickie Greenleaf, the son of a shipping tycoon. But, envious of Dickie's lifestyle, he decides that it would be simpler to murder him and take over his identity. Only Dickie's girlfriend Marge and friend Freddie Miles stand in his way... Anthony Minghella's Oscar-nominated, Bafta winning film, based on Patricia Highsmith's murderous character, mixes the glamour of '50s Italy with Damon's superb portrayal of a worryingly sympathetic killer

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: This rousing crime thriller follows an ex-con as he pulls off one last heist in order to pay his daughter's kidnapper, who mistakenly believes he possesses $10 million worth of stolen bonds

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: Remake of the 1950s western about a rancher who turns a notorious outlaw over to the authorities. In a bid to pay off his debts, the man agrees to join the team of men escorting the outlaw across country to the titular train, which will transport him to Yuma Prison. However, the rancher and his comrades soon find themselves pitted against the outlaw's band of vicious followers, who are desperate to rescue him

programme.title: The Life Aquatic With Steve Zissou
programme.desc: A famous oceanographer and his trusty crew seek revenge on the shark that ate his best friend in this quirky comedy-adventure

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: A talented though weird New York family comes together around their dying dad. But is he really unwell?

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: An American ex-military agent (Robert De Niro) strikes up a friendship with a one-time Serbian soldier (John Travolta) posing as a tourist in this Evan Daugherty-penned thriller directed by Ghost Rider's Mark Steven Johnson

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: An ex-con must pull off one last heist in order to pay his daughter's kidnapper, who mistakenly believes he possesses $10 million worth of stolen bonds(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: In this thrilling adaptation of the beloved novel, a young man living in a totalitarian society learns the true history of his community from a mysterious yet seemingly benevolent figure known as the Giver. In time, the youth finds the burden of the truth too great to bear and plots to escape(n)

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: The year is 2008 and US President Walter Emerson , is forced to make a monumental decision that will affect world history, in this taut political thriller. Trapped by a freak snowstorm in a tiny mid-American town in Colorado whilst campaigning for re-election, Emerson receives word that Iraqi dictator Uday Hussein has staged a surprise attack on Kuwait. It is the same type of attack which provoked the Gulf War in 1990, but this time Iraq has chemical and biological weapons ready to fire on Israel, Greece and Turkey(n)

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: Rival werewolves battle for a half-blood boy. One group wants to end the curse, but the other already has the taste for blood(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel(n)

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya
programme.desc: Comedian Pete Correale delivers a stand-up routine(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Six decades after WWII, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) returns to Vienna in order to reclaim family belongings that were once seized by the Nazis in this poignant drama based on a true story. Chief among those items is the Gustav Klimt painting "The Lady in Gold." With the help of her ambitious young lawyer (Ryan Reynolds), the woman takes her fight all the way from Austria to the U.S. Supreme Court(n)

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: This riveting epic tells two stories in two different time periods. In 1856, a slave and his family escape from a plantation near Richmond via the Underground Railroad. A century earlier, a slave-ship captain questions the morality of his mission(n)

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Profiling DJ AM (aka Adam Goldstein), a hugely successful and influential disc jockey known for his mash-ups of popular songs. The film traces the course of his life as he found fame and fought to remain sober, only to relapse and die of a drug overdose at the age of 36 following the trauma of surviving a plane crash(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: In this nail-biting international thriller, a couple (Owen Wilson and Lake Bell) and their two daughters relocate to Asia, only to find themselves caught in the middle of a dangerous coup. Realizing that foreigners are being murdered on the spot, they make a desperate decision to escape the violence on the streets and seek refuge at the American Embassy, all while trying to avoid detection by the merciless rebels. Directed by John Erick Dowdle. Pierce Brosnan co-stars

programme.title: Iverson
programme.desc: An in-depth documentary on the career and legacy of 11-time NBA All-Star Allen Iverson, who rejected NBA convention and embraced hip-hop culture. The film examines his troubled youth, his years at Georgetown and his career with the Philadelphia 76ers. Included: interviews with Dwyane Wade, Tom Brokaw, John Thompson and Larry Brown

programme.title: L Word Mississippi: Hate the Sin
programme.desc: Examining the unique challenges and struggles facing a group of lesbians who live in the conservative Deep South

programme.title: Heather McDonald: I Don't Mean to Brag
programme.desc: This stand-up concert captures Heather McDonald, a writer for Chelsea Handler, performing bits about balancing her own desires with being a mother

programme.title: Away From Her
programme.desc: Filmmaker Atom Egoyan -- a longtime onscreen collaborator with the gifted young actress Sarah Polley (The Sweet Hereafter) -- executive-produced Polley's directorial debut, Away from Her, starring Julie Christie, Olympia Dukakis, Michael Murphy, and Wendy Crewson. Adapted by Polley from a short story by Alice Munro, this small-scaled two-character drama concerns Grant (Gordon Pinsent) and Fiona (Christie), a long-married couple, well into their golden years, who are much in love and connected to one another on every level. "Soul mates" in the purest sense of the term, the two feel a sense of ease and tranquility in their rural home. But when Fiona's memory begins to slip away and she insists on being taken to a rest home, the decision stirs up torrents of guilt and regret in Grant's heart. The rules of the center only complicate matters, as they forbid visitation and communication with Fiona for an interminable period of time. He determines to support his wife at all costs, even if must happen at the expense of his own peace of mind

programme.title: Mistress
programme.desc: Writer Marvin sees his heartfelt script turned into Hollywood schlock by a washed-up producer and a trio of moneymen. They'll only put up the cash if there's a part in the movie for their mistresses who, it goes without saying, can't act. Like The Player, this shows that there's not all that much glitter in Tinseltown

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: A successful psychiatrist betrays his profession by falling in love with one of his patients

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: An aging Juilliard dance teacher must face his painful past during an interview with a grad student. Ultimately, the talk could lead to healing or despair for the interviewer's emotionally damaged husband

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: A young woman falls for her comatose brother's favourite musician in this romance set among the indie-music scene in Brooklyn

programme.title: Listen to Me Marlon

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: (2004) Jonathan Demme's remake of John Frankenheimer's 1962 thriller is updated to the Gulf War, with Ben Marco (Denzel Washington) as a member of a patrol saved by Raymond Shaw (Liev Schreiber). Shaw was awarded the Medal of Honor and is now standing for vice-president under the stern eye of his controlling mother Eleanor (Meryl Streep). But, unlike in the original film, she's a pawn not of the communists but of big business, who want their own man in the White House

programme.title: Dreamcatcher

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: In this provocative and affecting character study, Samuel L. Jackson stars as a righteous Tennessee farmer who finds a beaten harlot (Christina Ricci) outside his house and does everything in his power to return her to the path of righteousness and salvation. Ricci is a revelation as the lust-in-the-dust wanton woman with deep-seated psychological problems. Written and directed by Craig Brewer. The film's title comes from the name of a blues standard by Blind Lemon Jefferson(n)

programme.title: Let Us Prey

programme.title: The Other End of the Line

Anupam Kher, Sara Foster, Austin Basis. Directed by James Dodson(n)

Louis Gossett Jr., Tasha Smith, Tracee Ellis Ross, Malinda Williams(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds in this spirited adapted musical fantasy(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: An interesting hybrid of popular film genres, Ghost showcases the talents of its entire cast. While out on the town one evening, New York couple Sam (Patrick Swayze) and Molly (Demi Moore) are confronted by a mugger. After submitting to his demands, Sam is murdered anyway. He then finds himself a disembodied spirit, invisible to the living world, wandering without hope until he finds a spiteful spirit aboard the subway (Vincent Schiavelli) who gives him some helpful pointers on how to co-exist. Soon Sam comes back into contact with those he knew in life, and he begins to learn piece-by-piece of his close friend and co-worker Carl's (Tony Goldwyn) embezzling plot which caused his death; the apparent mugging was, in fact, a premeditated murder. In the meantime, Carl has designs on Molly, and Sam is determined to extract revenge. He contacts a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg), and together, the two set out to serve justice and stop the maniacal Carl from getting to Molly. Blending comedy, romance, action, and horror, Ghost was a box-office smash and managed to garner five Academy Award nominations, including "Best Picture," "Best Supporting Actress" (Goldberg), "Best Original Screenplay," "Best Editing," and "Best Score"; Goldberg won her first Oscar(n)

Years later, the girl appears at the boy's window in a ninja costume, and requests his help in punishing those who were cruel to her. The following day she disappears without a trace, leaving him in a state of emotional flux as he follows a bizarre trail of clues in hopes of tracking her down(n)

programme.title: Taking Lives
programme.desc: A female detective on the trail of a psychotic killer discovers love in a dangerous time in this thriller, based on the novel by Michael Pye. Illeana Scott (Angelina Jolie) is a special agent with the FBI who has a reputation for using offbeat methods, but also boasts a strong record as a criminal profiler. Scott is called in by a former Quantico colleague (Tcheky Karyo) to assist two Canadian police detectives, Paquette (Olivier Martinez) and Duval (Jean-Hugues Anglade), who are on the trail of a serial killer who has been doing business in and around Montreal for close to two decades. The murderer has a history of assimilating many aspects of the lives of his victims after he kills them, but there's been a witness to his most recent crime. Art gallery owner James Costa (Ethan Hawke) saw the killer during an assault, and now finds himself working as an only marginally willing decoy for Scott. As Scott and Costa follow the killer's trail, they find themselves becoming attracted to one another, which is not necessarily a comfort to Scott as she finds her quarry moving closer and closer. Taking Lives also stars Kiefer Sutherland and Gena Rowlands(n)

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Delightfully funny animated sequel sees the citified critter castaways getting airlifted off the island only to crash-land in the jungles of the dark continent, where they meet their species counterparts in the wild. Voices include Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and David Schwimmer. Directed by Eric Darnell and Tom McGrath. Willow Smith, daughter of Jada Pinkett Smith and Will Smith, provides the voice of baby Gloria(n)

programme.title: The Invasion
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller about a mystery disease that spreads across America following a space shuttle crash. After discovering that it is alien in origin, a Washington psychiatrist tries to protect her son, unaware that he may hold the key to saving mankind from destruction. Based on classic science fiction film The Invasion of the Body Snatchers(n)

programme.desc: Brilliant scientist Reed Richards builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past. This reboot of the iconic Marvel superhero team stars Miles Teller as Richards (who becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to bend and stretch his body into impossible shapes), Michael B. Jordan as Johnny Storm (aka the Human Torch, whose body can erupt in flames), Kate Mara as Sue Storm (aka the Invisible Woman -- no explanation needed), and Jamie Bell as Ben Grimm (who is transformed into the rock monster known as The Thing). Directed by Josh Trank, who previously worked with Jordan on the superhero film Chronicle(n)

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: In this sequel to Friday, Ice Cube returns as the streetwise LA dude who grassed up a local gangster. Who's now out and on his trail. This would be a good time to chill out in the suburbs with cousin Mike Epps and uncle Don 'Dc' Curry, who happens to have won the lottery but, as he finds out, money can't buy you love or security in Steve Carr's smart comedy

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm

programme.title: Igby Goes Down
programme.desc: This darkly funny coming-of-age story boasts an outstanding ensemble cast including Susan Sarandon, Bill Pullman, Claire Danes and Jeff Goldblum. Kieran Culkin stars as Igby, a rich teen who rebels against his dysfunctional family, including a yuppie brother (Ryan Phillippe), a tyrannical mother and a mentally ill father. Amanda Peet, Jared Harris

programme.title: Clean Slate
programme.desc: Dana Carvey is a private eye who wakes up every morning without a clue where, or who he is. It's like Memento, but with more belly laughs

programme.desc: In this filmization of the hit Broadway musical, a popular brothel is threatened with a shutdown by Texas authorities. Burt Reynolds plays the Sheriff, while Dolly Parton portrays the Chicken Ranch madam. While this film has its moments, it never reaches the entertainment heights of its stage predecessor

programme.title: Making of 'Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie'

The film stars Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley, and is directed by Mandie Fletcher(c)

programme.title: Eulogy
programme.desc: Writer/director Michael Clancy makes his feature film debut with the black comedy Eulogy. Zooey Deschanel plays Kate Collins, an unhappy college student who is made even more unhappy when her grandfather (Rip Torn) dies. Even though the entire family hates each other, they reunite at the home of Grandma Collins (Piper Laurie). Among other family members, Kate observes a war between her washed-up actor dad, Daniel (Hank Azaria); her lesbian Aunt Lucy (Kelly Preston); her wound-up Uncle Skip (Ray Romano); and her strict Aunt Alice (Debra Winger). Tensions escalate and family secrets are ultimately revealed. Kate is also inundated with the eulogy-writing duties, as she's the only one capable of such a task. Meanwhile, she reunites with old flame Ryan Carmichael (Jesse Bradford). Eulogy premiered at the Sundance Film Festival in 2004

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon, and Theodore are back in director Tim Hill's computer-animation/live-action hybrid following the further adventures of the world's most adorable singing trio. Songwriter Dave Seville (Jason Lee) has been struggling to gain recognition in the music industry for some time, and despite the fact that his former college roommate (David Cross) is now a high-profile powerbroker at Jett Records, Dave still can't manage to get a break. Things soon start to look up, however, when Dave discovers three singing chipmunks hiding out in the branches of a Christmas tree in Jett Records' world headquarters. Realizing that these woodland crooners cold prove to be his ticket to the big time, Dave does his best to transform Alvin (Justin Long), Simon (Matthew Gray Gubler), and Theodore (Jesse McCartney) into the next great pop sensation. As adorable and talented as they may be, though, these bouncy little critters aren't quite domesticated just yet; they still have a wild streak in them a mile wide, and it isn't long before Dave's life, home, and career are in utter chaos. But staying mad at such lovable little creatures is next to impossible, no matter what kind of mischief they might get into(n)
